title: Meditating role of career sustainability in the relationship between teachers’ self-efficacy and job satisfaction and subject well-being
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Uğur Özbilen, Ahmet Zeki Güven, Ömer Yiğit, Ömer Tuğrul Kara, Emrullah Banaz
